verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Shouts, shouts of joy
And victory resound in the tents
Of the righteous of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shouts of joy
And victory resound in the tents
Of the righteous of the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Lord's right hand
Has done mighty things for us
The Lord's right hand
Is lifted high

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Lord's right hand
Has done mighty things for us
The Lord's right hand reigns on high
The Lord's right hand reigns on high

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Shouts of joy
And victory resound in the tents
Of the righteous of the Lord

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Shouts of joy
And victory resound in the tents
Of the righteous of the Lord

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
The Lord's right hand
Has done mighty things for us
The Lord's right hand
Is lifted high

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The Lord's right hand
Has done mighty things for us
The Lord's right hand reigns on high
The Lord's right hand reigns on high
